oai_dc:dc.dc:title: CHANGES IN HEIGHT OP SHORT WAVES ON LONG WAVES
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sato, Michio
Nakamura, Kazuo
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: height changes
short waves
long waves
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this paper we describe an experimental study on changes in height of short gravity waves on long waves. Experiments were conducted by making mechanically generated long waves superpose on mechanically generated short waves in a wave flume of 30m long and lm wide. Exact solution by Longuet-Higgins and Stewart explained our experimental results, but approximate expression a'= a,(l+P) which is widely accepted seemed to be inadequate to explain our results.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 16 (1978): Proceedings of 16th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Hamburg, Germany, 1978.; 22
